titleStmt.title: The illustrious wife: viz. that excellent poem, Sir Thomas Overburie's wife illustrated by Giles Oldisworth, nephew to the same Sir T.O.
titleStmt.author: Oldisworth, Giles, 1619-1678.
Overbury, Thomas, Sir, 1581-1613. Sir Thomas Overburie his wife. aut

notesStmt.note: Based on: Overbury, Sir Thomas. Sir Thomas Overburie his wife.

Reproductions of the original in the Bodleian Library.
